00019 #ifndef SP_COPY_TO_TEXTURE_H
00020 #define SP_COPY_TO_TEXTURE_H
00021 
00022 #include "SpStreamFeedback.h"
00023 #include "SpGlHeaders.h"
00024 
00025 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 
00027 namespace Spark
00028 {
00029 
00030 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 class SpCopyToTextureFb : public SpStreamFeedback
00034 {
00035 
00037 public:
00038 
00039     inline SpCopyToTextureFb(
00040         GLuint uiTextureId=0,
00041         GLenum eTextureMode=0,
00042         int iX=0, int iY=0,
00043         int iWidth=0, int iHeight=0,
00044         int iOffsetX=0, int iOffsetY=0,
00045         bool bEnableCopy = true)
00046     :
00047         m_uiOutputTextureId(uiTextureId),
00048         m_eOutputTextureMode(eTextureMode),
00049         m_iX(iX), m_iY(iY),
00050         m_iWidth(iWidth), m_iHeight(iHeight),
00051         m_iOffsetX(iOffsetX), m_iOffsetY(iOffsetY),
00052         m_bEnableCopy(bEnableCopy)
00053     {
00054         // EMPTY!
00055     }
00056 
00057     virtual ~SpCopyToTextureFb()
00058     {
00059         // EMPTY!
00060     }
00061 
00063 public:
00064 
00065     virtual void setOutputTexture(
00066         unsigned int uiTextureId,
00067         int eTextureMode,
00068         int iWidth, int iHeight)
00069     {
00070         m_uiOutputTextureId = uiTextureId;
00071         m_eOutputTextureMode = eTextureMode;
00072         m_iWidth = iWidth;
00073         m_iHeight = iHeight;
00074     }
00075 
00076     virtual void updateOutput()
00077     {
00078         glBindTexture(m_eOutputTextureMode, m_uiOutputTextureId);
00079 
00080         if (m_bEnableCopy)
00081         {
00082             glCopyTexSubImage2D(
00083                 m_eOutputTextureMode, 0,
00084                 m_iOffsetX, m_iOffsetY,
00085                 m_iX, m_iY,
00086                 m_iWidth, m_iHeight
00087             );
00088         }
00089     }
00090 
00092 public:
00093 
00094     inline void setOutputRectangle(
00095         int iX, int iY,
00096         int iWidth, int iHeight,
00097         int iOffsetX, int iOffsetY)
00098     {
00099         m_iX = iX;
00100         m_iY = iY;
00101         m_iWidth = iWidth;
00102         m_iHeight = iHeight;
00103         m_iOffsetX = iOffsetX;
00104         m_iOffsetY = iOffsetY;
00105     }
00106 
00107     inline void setupViewport()
00108     {
00109         glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, m_iOldViewport);
00110         glViewport(m_iX, m_iY, m_iWidth, m_iHeight);
00111     }
00112 
00113     inline void bindOutputTexture() const
00114     {
00115         glBindTexture(m_eOutputTextureMode, m_uiOutputTextureId);
00116     }
00117 
00118     inline void restoreViewport() const
00119     {
00120         glViewport(
00121             m_iOldViewport[0], m_iOldViewport[1],
00122             m_iOldViewport[2], m_iOldViewport[3]
00123         );
00124     }
00125 
00127 public:
00128 
00129     inline void setEnableCopy(bool bEnable)
00130     { m_bEnableCopy = bEnable; }
00131 
00132     inline bool getEnableCopy() const
00133     { return m_bEnableCopy;    }
00134 
00135 
00137 protected:
00138 
00139     GLenum m_eOutputTextureMode;
00140     GLuint m_uiOutputTextureId;
00141 
00142     int m_iOffsetX;
00143     int m_iOffsetY;
00144     int m_iX;
00145     int m_iY;
00146     int m_iWidth;
00147     int m_iHeight;
00148 
00149     int m_iOldViewport[4];
00150 
00151     bool m_bEnableCopy;
00152 };
00153 
00154 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00155 
00156 }   // end namespace: Spark
